name: Degen
description: DEGEN is a reward token for Farcaster users, born from meme culture. It features a unique tipping system that allows the community to reward high-quality content creators. DEGEN also powers the Degen Chain, one of the pioneering Layer 3s launched on Base. Known as the “Las Vegas of blockchains,” it provides a platform for building and using Degen apps, offering a space for fun, innovation, and community-driven experiences.
